name: Tractor Division Preview
description:
Somewhere in Ukraine a brave farmer is on a Special Retrieval Operation. Fuel up your tractor and tow conquered enemy vehicles from the battlefield back to safety.

This is a preview of Tractor Division, made by a solo developer in my spare time. All profits from this game beyond the cost of development will be donated to the people of Ukraine, all support is highly appreciated. Please consider backing this project with the support button above, or by buying early access to the PC version at https://imminent.itch.io/tractor-division.

Planned features:

  • More maps
  • More towable vehicles and tanks
  • Tractor upgrades
  • Mobile version
  • Windows, Mac and Linux versions
